title: CarMax® - Original Twisted Loop Car Drying Towel - Double-Sided XXL - 90cm x 60cm 1400gsm Microfibre Towel for fast streak-free drying and detailing.
features: The CarMax Twisted Loop Drying Towel is the only car-drying towel you will ever need. Made from double-sided twisted loop fabric microfibre it gives a luxurious 1400gsm and the ultimate in drying capacity.
A New and Exciting Experience - These car drying towels just feel different, they have a natural weight that makes them follow the contours of every panel making drying easier than ever
Rapid, one pass drying - Just one pass is all you need with our Twisted Loop Technology, making it the fastest way to dry your vehicle, super absorbent, with a streak-free finish
Unrivaled Professional Capacity -No other drying towel matches the superior water absorption of our twisted loop towel, providing unparalleled drying capability even for the largest vehicles.
High Quality & Durable- Our Twisted Loop Car Drying Towels both XL and XXL are made to last, manufactured from the very best quality microfibre cloth and checked to a rigorous quality standard
description: Product Description Like no other microfibre! Awesome Drying Capacity Our twisted loop towels are made from premium grade microfibre using our unique twisted loop technology to deliver enhanced absorbency and softness. Super soft, highly absorbent Easy, high gloss, streak free finish Our towels are made with a unique double-sided twisted loop design and are finished with a rolled hem making them super soft. With a weight of 1400gsm, they have an industry-leading drying capacity, and their strong construction ensures they can be machine-washed and dried repeatedly. What's so special? CarMax Twisted Loop Technology It's the loops that make the difference, regular microfibre has a fraction of our enhanced drying capacity Drying off just got a whole lot easier One pass drying with CarMax Twisted Loop Technology The size and weight of our towels make drying off your vehicle fast and easy, just one pass is all that is required, meaning that you can dry off in super-quick time, leaving a steak-free, professional finish with minimal effort.
